channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Revolut launches business offering in Australia, seeks banking license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The crypto-friendly digital bank said the license would hold them to a higher “regulatory standard” that could give consumers confidence.

item.title: There's a growing case for allowing crypto firms to bypass banks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Patrick Hansen
item.description: Making the European Central Bank accessible to payment companies other than traditional banks would allow users to redeem their stablecoins directly for cash.

item.title: Binance Australia suspends AUD fiat services, citing issues with third party
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Australian dollar deposits and withdrawals have been impacted due to a decision made by its third-party provider, it said in an announcement.

item.title: Australia marks first FX transaction using a CBDC as eAUD pilot continues
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Australian digital dollar was used in a trade for a U.S. dollar stablecoin using an Ethereum layer 2 blockchain.

item.title: SEC warns that Filecoin ‘meets definition of a security’ — Grayscale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The regulator has asked Grayscale to withdraw its application for a Filecoin Trust product, saying it believes its underlying asset is a security.

item.title: Voyager bankruptcy plan approved, customers may recover 35.7% of claims initially
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The third try is a charm for the crypto brokerage, whose assets were almost bought by FTX and Binance.US. Now it’s just handing what it has over to its creditors.

item.title: Miami blockchain folk hero secures $5M for community tokenization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The fund will be used to help residents secure affordable housing through blockchain initiatives.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: Ethereum price is down today as trading volume remains low and traders send Ether to centralized exchanges.

item.title: Pakistani finance minister says crypto will never be legal because of FATF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Pakistan was taken off the FATF gray list in October, and it has good reasons to want to stay in international good graces.

item.title: South Korean prime minister calls for disclosure of crypto holdings by high-ranking officials
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Prime Minister Han Deok-soo reportedly believes that including cryptocurrency in property registration is the right thing to do.

item.title: US Secret Service has an NFT collection: Nifty Newsletter, May 10–16
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Elon Musk’s May 10 tweet featuring Milady NFT artwork drove the floor price to 7.3 ETH before settling at 5.69 ETH.

item.title: Uniswap will deploy on Polkadot parachain Moonbeam
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The decentralized exchange gets a Polkadot version via the Moonbeam network.

item.title: Price analysis 5/17: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are selling off on rallies, proof that investor sentiment remains negative in the short term.

item.title: LayerZero partners with Immunefi to launch $15M bug bounty
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The program offers a maximum reward of $15 million for anyone who identifies vulnerabilities classified as high severity.

item.title: Crypto.com adds Pay support for MATIC, USDC and DAI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange’s DeFi wallet and Pay service launched a new update adding support for more countries and tokens.

item.title: Ripple acquires Swiss blockchain custody firm Metaco for $250M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Metaco raised $17 million in a Series A funding round in 2020. The company raised $20 million in total before being acquired.

item.title: Bitcoin price capitulation below $26K possible as Friday’s BTC options expiry looms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: This week’s BTC options expiry could play a decisive role in Bitcoin’s price potentially trading below the $26,000 level.

item.title: China state-owned Greenland to apply for Hong Kong virtual asset trading license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The real estate developer’s fintech unit already has a digital banking license in Singapore; “We are ready to step into Hong Kong,” CEO says.

item.title: ‘One of the greatest’ Bitcoin metrics says BTC price bull run is here
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Cast aside short-term BTC price weakness to focus on the bigger investment trend, says on-chain analyst Philip Swift.

item.title: Bitcoin self-custody advocate explains why on-ramps are key to adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Cypherpunk Jameson Lopp highlights the need for easier-to-use, improved self-custody solutions and more on-ramp avenues to drive Bitcoin adoption.

item.title: Four open source Plutus Application Backend (PAB) for Cardano
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marvin Bertin
item.description: Cardano’s developer ecosystem has significantly matured over the past year and now offers a variety of PAB solutions to build and deploy dApps on Cardano.

item.title: How to use ChatGPT to learn WordPress
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Supercharge your WordPress learning with ChatGPT! Ask questions, get insights and enhance your website development skills.

item.title: New survey says Bitcoin is safer than the US dollar — Watch The Market Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses if Bitcoin is safer than the U.S. dollar, considering the impending risk of debt default.

item.title: Blockchain in space
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Irina Litchfield
item.description: To help remediate these issues, blockchain can serve as one of the potential technology solutions.

item.title: Tether to buy Bitcoin based on monthly net profits
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Tether said that Bitcoin’s decentralized nature and its long-term store of value made it an obvious choice for the stablecoin issuer.

item.title: Why is XRP price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is XRP price up today
item.description: The XRP price rally over the past few days is now at risk of exhaustion as a traditional bearish reversal pattern comes into view.

item.title: Valkyrie Leveraged Bitcoin Futures ETF gets inspiration from TradFi memes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: After being initially discussed in 2021, the investment fund is now capitalizing on the meme-worthy ticker for its new leveraged Bitcoin ETF.

item.title: Telegram addresses camera exploit, points to Apple macOS security permissions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Messaging app Telegram denies users were at risk after a security exploit was discovered that could allow attackers to gain control of a macOS device’s camera.

item.title: Watch these BTC price levels as Bitcoin threatens to lose $27K support
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin remains in a tight range with low liquidity, but expectations for new local lows are increasing.

item.title: Tesla updates AI-trained robot army, takes new bots for a walk
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A Tesla Bot demonstrated the ability to transfer objects from one container to another, showcasing its potential for performing human-like tasks.
